alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 6:21PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Harris County through 645 PM CDT... At 621 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Pasadena, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, Deer Park, South Houston, Webster, eastern South Belt / Ellington, Clear Lake, Nassau Bay, Taylor Lake Village, Shoreacres, Edgebrook Area, The Johnson Space Center, Ellington Field, Houston Ship Channel and Meadowbrook / Allendale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
